lead_paragraph: Rangana Herath claimed four Australian wickets to spin Sri Lanka to a remarkable 106-run victory on an intriguing final day in the weather-hit first test in Pallekele on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Herath Spins Sri Lanka to Memorable Win Over Australia
headline.main: Herath Spins Sri Lanka to Memorable Win Over Australia

snippet: Rangana Herath claimed four Australian wickets to spin Sri Lanka to a remarkable 106-run victory on an intriguing final day in the weather-hit first test in Pallekele on Saturday....
